name: Rusty Iron Sword
description: A basic sword showing signs of wear. Better than nothing.
plaggCommentary: Even I wouldn't touch that rusty thing! But hey, it's sharp enough to open cheese packets!

name: Steel Blade
description: A well-forged steel sword. Reliable and sharp.
plaggCommentary: Now we're talking! Still not as sharp as my wit though.

name: Blazing Scimitar
description: A curved blade wreathed in eternal flames.
plaggCommentary: Hot! Hot! Hot! Just like my temper when there's no camembert!

name: Frostbite Warhammer
description: A massive hammer that freezes enemies on impact.
plaggCommentary: Perfect for keeping cheese fresh! Wait, that's not what it's for?

name: Gale Force Rapier
description: A lightweight blade that strikes with the speed of wind.
plaggCommentary: Fast enough to steal cheese before anyone notices!

name: Boulder Crusher
description: A colossal maul that shakes the very ground.
plaggCommentary: Heavy enough to crack open the hardest cheese wheels!

name: Umbral Fang
description: A dagger forged from solidified shadows.
plaggCommentary: Perfect for sneaky cheese heists at midnight!

name: Dawn Piercer
description: A radiant spear blessed by the first light of dawn.
plaggCommentary: So bright! My eyes! But it'd make a great cheese fondue stick!

name: Arcane Focus Rod
description: A simple wooden staff for channeling magic.
plaggCommentary: Boring stick. Where's the cheese-summoning enchantment?

name: Crystalline Conduit
description: A staff topped with a pulsing magical crystal.
plaggCommentary: Shiny! I bet it could keep cheese at the perfect temperature!

name: Tempest Caller
description: A staff crackling with electrical energy.
plaggCommentary: Zappy! Perfect for grilling cheese sandwiches!

name: Necromancer's Focus
description: A wand carved from ancient bones, pulsing with dark magic.
plaggCommentary: Spooky! But can it resurrect aged cheese?

name: Woodland Longbow
description: A sturdy bow crafted from yew wood.
plaggCommentary: Good for hunting... cheese? Wait, that doesn't sound right.

name: Silverstring Recurve
description: An elegant bow with superior craftsmanship.
plaggCommentary: Fancy! But does it come with cheese-tipped arrows?

name: Flame Feather Longbow
description: A bow string with phoenix feathers that ignites arrows.
plaggCommentary: Fire arrows! Perfect for toasting bread for grilled cheese!

name: Dimensional Rift Crossbow
description: A crossbow that shoots bolts through space itself.
plaggCommentary: Interdimensional cheese delivery system! Now we're talking!

name: Celestial Moon Blade
description: A katana forged by the gods themselves, humming with divine power.
plaggCommentary: So sharp it could slice through the fabric of reality! Or just really tough cheese.

name: Entropy's Edge
description: A blade that randomly shifts between all elements.
plaggCommentary: Unpredictable! Like my mood when someone eats the last piece of camembert!

name: Claw of Destruction
description: A weapon infused with the very essence of Plagg's destructive power.
plaggCommentary: Hey, that's my claw! How did you get that? ...Actually, never mind, just don't use it on cheese!

name: Dimensional Tearer
description: A weapon capable of tearing holes in reality itself.
plaggCommentary: Whoa there! That's a bit too destructive, even for me! ...Can it tear open cheese packages though?

name: Starfall Reaper
description: A scythe forged from collapsed stars and cosmic dust.
plaggCommentary: Now that's what I call ultimate destruction! Though it seems like overkill for opening cheese wheels...
